Comment: Trump famously has a long-running obsession with the size of his hands—an insecurity so deep he once felt compelled to announce, “My hands are normal hands,” to the *Washington Post*’s editorial board while running for president in 2016.  *Spy* magazine co-founder Kurt Andersen explains how he helped plant that insecurity more than 30 years ago, when the publication first called Trump a “short-fingered vulgarian,” on [the latest episode of *The Daily Beast Podcast*](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WD3YxtVwxik).  [**Read more here**](https://www.thedailybeast.com/how-spy-magazine-triggered-trumps-biggest-insecurity/).
Author: thedailybeast
